snippet: Abby Wambach scored her 155th international goal, moving three behind Mia Hamm’s record, but the United States women settled for a tie against Germany.
abstract: United States women's soccer team ties Germany, 3-3, in exhibition game.
lead_paragraph: Abby Wambach scored her 155th international goal, moving three behind Mia Hamm’s record, but the United States women settled for a tie against Germany.

headline.seo: Abby Wambach Nears Record and United States Ties Germany
headline.main: Wambach Closes on Record for Goals

keywords.value: United States Women's National Soccer Team
